pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:6.4: “etha, sikkhamānā, imaṃ jānātha, imaṃ detha, imaṃ āharatha, iminā attho, imaṃ kappiyaṃ karothā”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.1: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā … pe … tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.2: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.3: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.6: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.7: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.10: “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dātuṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.12: Tāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā ekaṃsaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ karitvā bhikkhunīnaṃ pāde vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā añjaliṃ paggahetvā evamassa vacanīyo—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:7.13: ‘ahaṃ, ayye, itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācāmī’ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:8.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:8.3: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ dadeyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:9.2: Ayaṃ itthannāmā itthannāmāya ayyāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhā sikkhamānā saṃghaṃ vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ yācati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:9.3: Saṃgho itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiṃ deti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:9.4: Yassā ayyāya khamati itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammutiyā dānaṃ, sā tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:10.1: Dinnā saṃghena itthannāmāya dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhāya sikkhamānāya vuṭṭhānasammuti;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:10.2: khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:11.1: Atha kho bhagavā tā bhikkhuniyo anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya … pe …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:11.2: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:12.1: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dve vassāni chasu dhammesu sikkhitasikkhaṃ sikkhamānaṃ saṃghena asammataṃ vuṭṭhāpeyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:13.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippetā bhikkhunīti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:14.6: ñattidutiyena kammena vuṭṭhānasammuti na dinnā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:15.1: “Vuṭṭhāpessāmī”ti gaṇaṃ vā ācariniṃ vā pattaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā pariyesati, sīmaṃ vā sammannati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc64:15.5: Gaṇassa ca ācariniyā ca āpatti dukkaṭassa.
